import React,{useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ExplanationInput=_ref=>{let{onSubmit}=_ref;const[explanation,setExplanation]=useState("");const[complexity,setComplexity]=useState("O(1)");// Default selection
